bones material is very soft and it's very easy to accidentally

pin that is stopping against sheer snapping force you're gonna need to buy
some very very very fine drill bits in order to drill out the
holes for these pins I personally use a rotary tool from procs line to drill the

play the other trick you can use is to just take a little dab of paint put it
